title: Jimmy Carter - We Can Have Peace in the Holy Land (2009)
description:
Audio book edition of Jimmy Carter's 2009 book We Can Have Peace in the Holy Land: A Plan That Will Work (ISBN 1439140634) Unabridged and read by Carter himself. Readme info:

*Before anything else*
Give some money, time, and effort to those making peace in Israel/Palestine.

If you can get this book for free and you decide that you want to keep it, the least you can do is help make the world a better place.


*Contents*
1.) Audio book edition of Jimmy Carter's We Can Have Peace in the Holy Land
2.) PDF maps included with the Enhanced CD
3.) Bonus disc of Sunday school sermons that was included with the audio book


*How this was created*
1.) Ripped from disc using Exact Audio Copy to wav.
2.) Converted from wav to VBR MP3 ~65kpbs using Foobar and LAME.
3.) Turned into a torrent with Azureus/Vuze.
